about_the_game:
The Famer's Dynasty Machine Pack extends your fleet! New tractors, functional new trailers and a new seed drill make your work much easier.

Gecko Strong 09
A powerful and agile tractor provides more power on the field.

Fliegl DK 110-88
A practical pendant that you can easily couple with others.

Borne Special 281
A real classic tractor brings pure retro feeling to your farm!

Krampe Big Body 900
A huge trailer with a capacity of 28,000 kilograms makes your deliveries easy and convenient.

Amazone D9 6000
The biggest seed drill in the whole game makes planting your fields a breeze!

name: Farmer's Dynasty - Machines Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo / AMD X2, min. 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, min. 1.5GB dedicated VRAM (AMD Radeon HD 7000 series / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 500 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Famer's Dynasty Machine Pack extends your fleet! New tractors, functional new trailers and a new seed drill make your work much easier.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Dutch, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
